{{Wired embedded system |brand=USRobotics |model=USR8200 |revision= |upc=738168034963 |asin=B0000A1EES |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |availability=EoL |est_release_date=06/2003 |fcc_date= |fcc_id= |pcb_id=KN140172 |type=VPN Router Firewall, NAS, router |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=3.33 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Intel XScale |cpu1_model=IXP422;FWIXP422AB; |cpu1_cspeed=266 |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Intel |fla1_model=TE28F128-J3C150 <!-- E28F128-J3A150 --> |ram1=64 |ram1_brand=Mosel Vitelic |ram1_model=V54C3256164VBLT7 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, 1394a (Firewire) |expansion_usb_num=2 |jtag=yes |serial=yes,, 10-pin header,, populated |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Altima |eth_chip2_model=AC101L;AC101LKQT, TD0421 P11, 720842A; |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6060;88E6060-RCJ, FB79501.2, 0328 B0P, Taiwan; |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=100M |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips=4-bit Real Time Clock;Epson;RTC7301;;1; ,,, RS-232 Driver Receiver;Sipex;SP3220;SP3220ECA-0416;1; ,,, PCI USB 2.0 4-Port Host Controller;VIA;VT6202;VT6202, 0325CD, 23A5019200;1; ,,, PCI 1394a Integrated Host Controller;VIA;VT6307;VT6307S, 0324CD, 2HA1006436;1; |flags=RTC w/ battery backup |stock_boot= |stock_os=Linux;2.4.19;OpenRG; |tp_firmware=OpenWrt, DD-WRT, |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass= |oui_eth=00:C0:49 }} {{TagLine|Secure Storage Router Pro, Firewall / VPN / NAS}} :{{SupportPage|vendor=USRobotics|vs_id=8200}}
"P/N:KN140172" is silkscreened on the board in ''RN'''s image shown below.. :and on the board shown on the ''OpenWrt'' Wiki page.
